cause.description:
We try to save the teenagers from violence and alcohol abuse because in México about 15 000 young people die ech year in acts of violence and accidents involving alcohol. Car accidents, fights and violent acts involving alcohol are the first cause of death in people between 14 and 29 years old
1. 15 000 teenagers die each year
2. alcohol is the first cause of death in teenagers
3. boys in México start to drink when they turn 13 and when they turn 14 they drink at least 3 times a month
cause.mission: help teenagers that can get involved in a act of violence because of alcohol abuse
cause.name: convivencia sin violencia
